ygData.subject: Re: 15th level to 19th level
ygData.msgSnippet: Well.. from a dark elf, i personally hunted a lot in oasis up to 16-17.  I then grouped in Najena and killed tentacle terrors, also grouped in South Ro (dry
ygData.messageBody:
Well.. from a dark elf, i personally hunted a lot in oasis up to 16-17. I
then grouped in Najena and killed tentacle terrors, also grouped in South Ro
(dry bones, ghouls), then grouped in Upper Guk and got some nice mesh pieces
that sold for around 10 pp each. Once i hit 18, I travelled to Unrest and
am there now gathering up bronze :)
Allsar - 19 cleric - Brotherhood of the Spider - Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: Greggory Peck <greggorypeck@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 31, 1999 6:09 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] 15th level to 19th level


>From: "Greggory Peck" <greggorypeck@...>
>
>I can certainly relate to this. I'm level 16 now and am really hurting in
>the xp devision. Not to mention the cash division. I went back to killing
>crocs in Oasis of Marr. No cash flow though. I was told that scarecrow
>fields in W. Karnas might be good. I'd like to stay on the mainland myself
>so I'm not quite sure. Anybody have a good answer for this? I was also
>told perhaps mino's in the gorge. I'm not exactly sure myself. I welcome
>some feedback.
>
>Duhas
>TarrewMarr

>> >What I want to know is....where should I be fighting in order to go from
>> >15th level to 19th level quickly? I've been in Highpass Hold recently

>> >the orcs were camped heavily. I'm in Freeport now, and need a good place
>> >to go (preferably with a group, as my Smite spell is difficult to cast
>> >while being attacked!)
>> >
>> >thanks,
>> >Flidias Anfalas
>> >karana server
>>
>>
>> The Best place i have found to hunt from 15th up to 20th is Oasis,
>Befallen,
>> Lake Rathe and Beholder Maze. They all give good exp and loot exsept
Oasis
>> which is just croc meat :)
>>
>> If anyone else need any info please drop me a message and i will get back
>to
>> ya
